data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.IfYouUploadFile
data.value: If you’ve already uploaded this file, you’ll need to remove this member and then re-upload the file. If you’ve submitted this file to the environmental regulator, you must re-submit the updated file within the next 28 days.

data.value: Next steps

data.value: return to view all scheme members

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.FromMemberReg
data.value: from either your registration file or your members organisation file, depending on which period this change is to be recorded.

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.IfYouUploadFileReg
data.value: If you’ve already uploaded this file, you’ll need to remove this member and then re-upload the appropriate file. If you’ve submitted this file to the environmental regulator, you must re-submit the updated file within the next 28 days.

data.value: re-upload and submit members’ organisation details-Historical

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.ReUploadReg
data.value: Resubmit the registration file-Current period

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.IfRemovedReg
data.value: If you want to add them to your account again, they will need to name you as their compliance scheme in their 'Report packaging data' account.

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.RemoveOrgFromFile
data.value: You'll still need to remove {0} from either your organisation details file or your registration file, depending on the date you first registered them as a member and inform us of the change within 28 days.

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.ReturnSchemeMembersReg
data.value: Return to view all scheme members

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.YouWillNeedTo
data.value: You'll need to

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.OrgLinkText
data.value: remove them from your report members' organisation details file and re-upload it.

data.name: ConfirmationOfRemoval.RegLinkText
data.value: remove them from your organisation's registration file and re-upload it.

data.value: If you registered this organisation as a member before 1 April 2025
